query:
SELECT 
  i.id,
  i.productId,
  p.sku,
  p.description,
  i.batch,
  i.locationCode,
  i.quantity as totalQuantity,
  i.reservedQuantity,
  (i.quantity - i.reservedQuantity) as availableQuantity,
  i.tenantId,
  t.name as tenantName
FROM inventory i
INNER JOIN products p ON i.productId = p.id
LEFT JOIN tenants t ON i.tenantId = t.id
WHERE i.locationCode = 'H01-01-02'
ORDER BY i.id;
